title: Primary Cause of El Nino Climate Variations

content.prompt: Which of the following is a primary cause of El Niño climate variations?

choices.label: Reversals of Hadley cell circulation in the Atlantic Ocean
Increased dust blowing into the Atlantic Ocean from the Sahara desert
Warmer surface waters in the Pacific Ocean
Reduced deep-water upwelling in the Pacific Ocean

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
